column4: How can I re-enable a display that I've turned off with xrandr? I can do it with System-Preferences-Screen Resolution, but I'm looking for the command...
man xrandr or xrandr --help ... I think its something like xrandr --LCD --on
great, well, its all in there..
no, I can't find a way to turn a display on once it's been turned off with --off
